entries.name: CURRENT
entries.desc:
A platform-specific gem that is built for the packaging Ruby's
platform. This will be replaced with ::local.

entries.name: RUBY
entries.desc:
A pure-Ruby gem that may use Gem::Specification#extensions
to build binary files.

entries.name: ==(other)
entries.desc: Is other equal to this platform?  Two platforms are equal if they have the same CPU, OS and version.

entries.name: ===(other)
entries.desc: Does other match this platform?  Two platforms match if they have the same CPU, or either has a CPU of 'universal', they have the same OS, and they have the same version, or either has no version.

entries.name: =~(other)
entries.desc: Does other match this platform?  If other is a String it will be converted to a Gem::Platform first.  See === for matching rules.
